text:
Madalena Lucília Iglésias do Vale de Oliveira (24 October 1939 – 16 January 2018) was a Portuguese actress and singer. She represented Portugal at the Eurovision Song Contest 1966, with the song "Ele e ela". She was born in Lisbon. She also appeared in movies such as "Uma hora de Amor" (1964), "Canção da Saudade" (1964) and in "Sarilho de fraldas" (1966).
Iglésias died in Barcelona, Spain on 16 January 2018 at the age of 78.
